description.black-white:
Looking for an opening, the user strikes
continually. The target’s stat changes
don’t affect this attack’s damage.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.
